resource_dependency.stockDatabaseSchema: A database table named 'stocks' with fields: symbol (string, unique), name (string), sector (string), market_cap (number), last_price (number), change_percent (number), and description (text).

function: Allow users to search for stocks by entering either a stock code or name.
static_description: A centered search bar at the top of the page with a placeholder text 'Enter stock symbol or name', accompanied by a magnifying glass icon (searchIconSVG) on the right side. The background is white (#FFFFFF) and the input field border is navy (#000080).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking inside the search bar focuses it and allows typing.
Pressing Enter after typing initiates the search query and displays results or suggestions.

resource_dependency.suggestionItemStyle: List item with padding, hover effect changing background to light gray (#f0f0f0)

function: Provide real-time suggestions while the user types in the search bar.
static_description: Below the search bar appears a dropdown list of suggested stock matches when typing begins. Each suggestion includes the stock symbol and full name aligned left-to-right.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over any suggestion highlights it using the suggestionItemStyle.
Clicking a suggestion populates the search bar with that stockâ€™s symbol or name and triggers the search.

resource_dependency.stockSummaryDataSchema: Fields: symbol, name, current_price, change_amount, change_percentage, previous_close, open_price, volume, market_cap

function: Display a concise summary of essential stock details upon selecting or searching for a stock.
static_description: A card positioned below the search bar showing key metrics such as price, daily movement, opening value, trading volume, and market cap. Background image set via infoCardBackgroundImage, with navy text color (#000080).

function: Visualize historical market trends through interactive charts.
static_description: A chart area displaying line graphs representing stock performance over time. Time range selector buttons above the chart allow switching between periods defined in timeRangeOptions.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a time range button fetches updated trend data from trendDataEndpoint and redraws the chart accordingly.

resource_dependency.financialMetricsSchema: Fields: pe_ratio, eps, dividend_yield, beta, revenue_growth, debt_to_equity, roe

function: Present important financial metrics and ratios relevant to selected stocks.
static_description: A tabular view listing key financial indicators such as P/E ratio, EPS, Dividend Yield, Beta, Revenue Growth, Debt-to-Equity Ratio, and ROE. Styled with navy headers and clean formatting.

function: Enable users to choose their preferred output format for generated reports.
static_description: A segmented control group labeled 'Report Format' placed near the top of the report customization panel. Options include PDF, Markdown, and HTML icons/text representations.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting an option updates the preview style and prepares the report generation endpoint accordingly.

function: Let users pick which sections they want included in their custom report.
static_description: A vertical checklist with checkboxes next to each section title (e.g., Basic Info, Market Trends, Financial Data, etc.) under the heading 'Choose Sections'. All items unchecked initially.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggling a checkbox selects or deselects the corresponding section for inclusion in the final report.

function: Automatically compile and present a tailored stock report based on user selections.
static_description: After configuring format and sections, clicking 'Generate Report' triggers processing. A spinner graphic (loadingSpinnerGIF) replaces the button temporarily until completion.

interaction_and_states.description: Initiates POST request to generateReportEndpoint with selected parameters; shows loading indicator then renders or downloads the report.

function: Maintain consistent white background throughout all pages and components.
static_description: All major containers, body backgrounds, modals, cards, and overlays use solid white (#FFFFFF) as per globalCSSVariables.

function: Apply navy-colored theme to interactive UI elements like buttons, inputs, links, and navigation bars.
static_description: Buttons, form borders, active tabs, and highlighted menu items are styled using navyThemeColors.primary. Rounded corners follow buttonBorderRadius setting.

interaction_and_states.description: Interactive elements darken slightly using navyThemeColors.secondary.

resource_dependency.mediaQueryBreakpoints: { mobile: max-width 768px, tablet: min-width 769px and max-width 1024px, desktop: min-width 1025px }

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience across various screen sizes including mobile phones, tablets, and desktops.
static_description: Layout adjusts dynamically using responsiveGridFramework. Content stacks vertically on small screens and arranges horizontally on larger ones. Padding/margins scale according to mediaQueryBreakpoints.

function: Indicate ongoing processes during lengthy operations such as report generation.
static_description: While waiting for responses, especially during report creation, a centrally-aligned loader animation (progressIndicatorComponent) replaces actionable areas or overlays content.

resource_dependency.errorMessageTemplate: Invalid stock symbol entered. Please try again.

function: Notify users clearly when invalid inputs or missing data prevent successful actions.
static_description: Upon encountering errors (like unknown stock symbols), an alert message matching errorMessageTemplate appears beneath the input field or within the affected module. Styled with red text and warning icon.

function: Allow users to save or download generated reports locally in multiple formats.
static_description: Once a report is ready, a 'Download' button featuring exportButtonIcon becomes visible beside the rendered document. Dropdown reveals available extensions listed in supportedExportFormats.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers file download prompt for chosen format without reloading the page.

resource_dependency.sessionTimeoutHandler: Redirect to loginRedirectURL if token expired

function: Manage authenticated sessions to enable personalization features like saved preferences or history tracking.
static_description: Top-right corner displays either 'Login' link or logged-in user avatar depending on auth status. Session tokens stored securely client-side.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' navigates to loginRedirectURL. Authenticated users can access profile settings or logout directly.
